code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a male aged 48 yrs presents with moderate recurrent bifrontal headaches, moderate phonophobia and moderate photophobia. he is having symptoms 18 x week, in spite of treatment. he denies smoking describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 2 years in his past o:Height 181 cm, Weight 93.4 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Migraine Headaches p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

s:white m gun smith aged 48 yrs complains of moderate daily headache and moderate headache that is preceded by nausea and other medical problems. NKDA. o:Height 180 cm, Weight 92.7 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16 a:Migraine Headaches p:performed E/M Level 1 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed amitriptyline - 50 mg daily bedtime.

s:pt complains of moderate headache that is preceded by nausea and moderate daily headache. NKDA. he is a white M aged 48 years. he does not smoke describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 4 years in his past o:Height 181 cm, Weight 93.7 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Migraine Headaches p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed propanolol - 80 mg daily (divided into 6 doses), and ordered CBC, Electrolyte Panel.
